title: parse top(expression) for SQLServer query
body:
Fixes #4867 .

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- modify the `TOP` rule in DMLStatement.g4 of SQLServer
- add function `visitTop()` to parse the `TOP` rule
- add parse test cases to check `TOP` rule
- modify the relative test cases in `select-pagination.xml` and `select-pagination-group-by-order-by.xml`

title: Optimize startup time, ignore load unConfigured table's column and in
body:
Fixes #6212.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Remove the load procedure for unconfigured tables. load only table names for unconfigured tables.
- Remove the refresh procedure for unconfigured tables
- Remove the multi-thread logic for unconfigured tables. (Configured tables still use multi-thread)

title: Parse `Top(expression)` query of SQLServer with ANTLR
body:
Fixes #4867.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Correct the `TOP` definition in `DMLStatement.g4` of SQLServer.
- Add function `visitTop()` of SQLServerDMLVisitor to parse out `NumberLiteralRowNumberValueSegment`.
- Modify `visitProjection()` of SQLServerDMLVisitor to parse out `TopProjectionSegment`.
